actions.committee: House Committee on District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to provide that in the District of Columbia any person who has attained the age of 18 years shall be held and considered to be a person of full legal age.

summary.text: Provides that in the District of Columbia any person who has attained the age of eighteen years shall be held and considered to be a person of full legal age.

titles.title: A bill to provide that in the District of Columbia any person who has attained the age of 18 years shall be held and considered to be a person of full legal age.
